Hymn.Arabic: ارْحَمْنِي يَا أَللَّهُ كَعَظِيمِ رَحْمَتِكَ ، وَبِحَسَبِ كَثْرَةِ رَأْفَاتِكَ.
Hymn.English: 51:1 Have mercy upon me, O God, According to Your loving kindness; According to the multitude of Your tender mercies, Blot out my transgressions.

Hymn.Arabic: اِصْرِفْ وَجْهَكَ عَنْ خَطَايَايَ ، وَأَمْحُ جَمِيعَ آثَامِي. هَلِلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 9 Hide Your face from my sins, And blot out all my iniquities.
